R

NorSentLex:
An R package containing sentiment dictionaries for Norwegian

noRc:
An R package for downloading and structuring votes in Stortinget

stortingscrape:
An R package for downloading data from data.stortinget.no

tonR:
An R package for the Talk of Norway corpus

ministersNor:
Replication material for "Survival of the ministers"

stortingOCR:
R package for converting pictures of Storting debates to text
